00043 // *************************************************************************
00044 double compareSMatrices( int m, int n, real *a, int lda, real *b, int ldb )
00045 {
00046   int i, j;//, iMax, jMax;
00047   double max_diff = 0.0, diff;
00048 
00049   for ( j=0; j<n; j++ ) {
00050     for ( i=0; i<m; i++ ){
00051       diff = fabs( (a[j*lda+i] - b[j*ldb+i]) );
00052       //if(diff > 0.1) printf("error: %d %d %f %f\n",i, j, a[j*lda+i], b[j*ldb+i]);
00053       if(diff > max_diff)
00054       {
00055         max_diff = diff;
00056         //iMax = i;
00057         //jMax = j;
00058       }
00059     }
00060   }
00061 
00062   //printf("%e %e %e %d %d\n", max_diff, b[jMax*ldb+iMax], a[jMax*ldb+iMax], iMax, jMax);
00063   return max_diff;
00064 }
00065 
00066 // *************************************************************************
00067 double compareDMatrices( int m, int n, double *a, int lda, double *b, int ldb )
00068 {
00069   int i, j;//, iMax, jMax;
00070   double max_diff = 0.0, diff;
00071 
00072   for ( j=0; j<n; j++ ) {
00073     for ( i=0; i<m; i++ ){
00074       diff = fabs( (a[j*lda+i] - b[j*ldb+i]) );
00075       //if(diff > 0.1) printf("error: %d %d %f %f\n",i, j, a[j*lda+i], b[j*ldb+i]);
00076       if(diff > max_diff)
00077       {
00078         max_diff = diff;
00079         //iMax = i;
00080         //jMax = j;
00081       }
00082     }
00083   }
00084 
00085   //printf("%e %e %e %d %d\n", max_diff, b[jMax*ldb+iMax], a[jMax*ldb+iMax], iMax, jMax);
00086   return max_diff;
00087 }

00089 // *************************************************************************
00090 double compareCMatrices( int m, int n, complex *a, int lda, complex *b, int ldb )
00091 {
00092   int i, j;//, iMax, jMax;
00093   double max_diff = 0.0, diff;
00094 
00095   for ( j=0; j<n; j++ ) {
00096     for ( i=0; i<m; i++ ){
00097       diff = fabs( (a[j*lda+i].r - b[j*ldb+i].r) );
00098       //if(diff > 0.1) printf("error: %d %d %f %f\n",i, j, a[j*lda+i].r, b[j*ldb+i].r);
00099       if(diff > max_diff)
00100       {
00101         max_diff = diff;
00102         //iMax = i;
00103         //jMax = j;
00104       }
00105       diff = fabs( (a[j*lda+i].i - b[j*ldb+i].i) );
00106       //if(diff > 0.1) printf("error: %d %d %f %f\n",i, j, a[j*lda+i].i, b[j*ldb+i].i);
00107       if(diff > max_diff)
00108       {
00109         max_diff = diff;
00110         //iMax = i;
00111         //jMax = j;
00112       }
00113     }
00114   }
00115 
00116   //printf("%e %e %e %d %d\n", max_diff, b[jMax*ldb+iMax], a[jMax*ldb+iMax], iMax, jMax);
00117   return max_diff;
00118 }

00120 // *************************************************************************
00121 double compareZMatrices( int m, int n, doublecomplex *a, int lda, doublecomplex *b, int ldb )
00122 {
00123   int i, j;//, iMax, jMax;
00124   double max_diff = 0.0, diff;
00125 
00126   for ( j=0; j<n; j++ ) {
00127     for ( i=0; i<m; i++ ){
00128       diff = fabs( (a[j*lda+i].r - b[j*ldb+i].r) );
00129       //if(diff > 0.1) printf("error: %d %d %f %f\n",i, j, a[j*lda+i].r, b[j*ldb+i].r);
00130       if(diff > max_diff)
00131       {
00132         max_diff = diff;
00133         //iMax = i;
00134         //jMax = j;
00135       }
00136       diff = fabs( (a[j*lda+i].i - b[j*ldb+i].i) );
00137       //if(diff > 0.1) printf("error: %d %d %f %f\n",i, j, a[j*lda+i].i, b[j*ldb+i].i);
00138       if(diff > max_diff)
00139       {
00140         max_diff = diff;
00141         //iMax = i;
00142         //jMax = j;
00143       }
00144     }
00145   }
00146 
00147   //printf("%e %e %e %d %d\n", max_diff, b[jMax*ldb+iMax], a[jMax*ldb+iMax], iMax, jMax);
00148   return max_diff;
00149 }

00151 // *************************************************************************
00152 void randomSFill(real *a, int len)
00153 {
00154   real recipRAND_MAX = 1.0f / ((real) RAND_MAX);
00155   int index;
00156 
00157   for(index = 0; index<len; index++)
00158   {
00159     a[index]=2.0f * ((real) rand())*((real) recipRAND_MAX) - 1.0f;
00160   }
00161 }
00162 
00163 // *************************************************************************
00164 void randomDFill(double *a, int len)
00165 {
00166   double recipRAND_MAX = 1.0 / ((double) RAND_MAX);
00167   int index;
00168 
00169   for(index = 0; index<len; index++)
00170   {
00171     a[index]=2.0 * ((double) rand())*((double) recipRAND_MAX) - 1.0;
00172   }
00173 }
00174 
00175 // *************************************************************************
00176 void randomCFill(complex *a, int len)
00177 {
00178   real recipRAND_MAX = 1.0f / ((real) RAND_MAX);
00179   int index;
00180 
00181   for(index = 0; index<len; index++)
00182   {
00183     a[index].r = 2.0f * ((real) rand())*((real) recipRAND_MAX) - 1.0f;
00184     a[index].i = 2.0f * ((real) rand())*((real) recipRAND_MAX) - 1.0f;
00185   }
00186 }
00187 
00188 // *************************************************************************
00189 void randomZFill(doublecomplex *a, int len)
00190 {
00191   double recipRAND_MAX = 1.0 / ((double) RAND_MAX);
00192   int index;
00193 
00194   for(index = 0; index<len; index++)
00195   {
00196     a[index].r = 2.0 * ((double) rand())*((double) recipRAND_MAX) - 1.0;
00197     a[index].i = 2.0 * ((double) rand())*((double) recipRAND_MAX) - 1.0;
00198   }
00199 }
